alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 3:26PM CST until December 14 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CST. * At 326 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles south of Rock Hill, or 14 miles northwest of Wiggins, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Rock Hill around 335 PM CST. Maxie around 340 PM CST. Brooklyn around 345 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
